name: museum of hoomanz
description:
Welcome to the museum of hoomans! 

Cryptids always knew that somebody was living on the other side of a flat Earth. They noticed traces of civilizations very different than their own.

In 1812 a weird wooden vessel was found not far away from the Bermuda triangle, but for a long time, it was considered fake.

In 1952 first actual photo of hoomans was made from one of the spaceships not far away from the Atlantic ocean. 

In 1958 the first actual hooman settlement was found by professor Bigfoot Jr. on the exploration of the Yellowstone volcano area. 

After that, active hooman research began. This museum tells a little bit about the life of those unique weird creatures that all this time lived nearby.

_______________________________________________________________________

Controls:

WASD or arrows to walk

Click to see the exhibition description

SPACE to jump

_______________________________________________________________________

Special gratitude towards Vitreledonella, FerrumAlien, decayingdeaddecadence and kartoha_morj for voicing the characters.
